page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT
page.content: A survey on how pupils' families are employed showed that the majority are employed in some capacity by B.U.T.E.C. (British Underwater Test Evaluation Centre) at Kyle. They include drivers, security men, helicopter pilots, cleaners, cooks, seamen, computer-operators etc. but they are not necessarily living inside our Domesday Block. We also looked at the occupiers of houses on this block and discovered that many were retired people. All the houses are privately owned. The National Trust owns most of the land but does not employ many people. Auchtertyre Farm employs only one man at present and some croft fields are worked by people not resident on the block.
